Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.customcomponents.bookshelf

Class PersonalBookshelfView

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.Parent
javafx.scene.layout.Region
javafx.scene.layout.Pane
javafx.scene.layout.StackPane
it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.customcomponents.bookshelf.BookshelfView
it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.customcomponents.bookshelf.PersonalBookshelfView
All Implemented Interfaces:
MyShelfieComponent, javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class PersonalBookshelfView extends BookshelfView
The PersonalBookshelfView class represents a graphical component that displays the personal bookshelf of a player in a board game. It extends the BookshelfView class and provides additional functionalities specific to the personal bookshelf view.

The personal bookshelf view is used to visualize the target cells of the personal bookshelf and add tile type hints to those cells based on the provided personal goal configuration. It allows coloring the target cells with corresponding colors and hiding the tile type hints.

The personal bookshelf view is designed for use in a JavaFX GUI application. It utilizes JavaFX layouts, styles, and CSS properties to render the graphical representation of the bookshelf.

Since:
1.0
Author:
Tommaso Trabacchin, Melanie Tonarelli, Emanuele Valsecchi, Adem Shehi

    • precedentStyleCells

      private final Map<Coordinate,String> precedentStyleCells
      A map that stores the precedent style (CSS) of each cell in the bookshelf. This map is used to restore the original style when hiding the tile type hint. The key is the cell coordinate, and the value is the CSS style string.
